SEARCH
Package edu.westmont.cs030.maze

Class Maze

java.lang.Object
edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Maze
public class Maze extends Object
Represents a maze as a 2D array of Cells.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final Cell[][]
    cells
    2D array of Cells to represent this maze.

  • Field Details

    • cells

      public final Cell[][] cells
      2D array of Cells to represent this maze.

  • Constructor Details

    • Maze

      public Maze(int numRows, int numCols)
      Initializes the maze given the dimensions of the maze in number of rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      numRows - number of rows this maze should have
      numCols - number of columns this maze should have

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Resets every cell in this maze to a new Cell configured as a wall.

    • getNeighbors

      public ArrayList<Cell> getNeighbors(Cell cell)
      Given a Cell, returns an ArrayList of Cell consisting of its neighbors in all Directions, as long as the neighbor(s) exist within the bounds of this maze.
      Parameters:
      cell - the Cell whose neighbors are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      ArrayList of neighboring cells to the Cell given in the parameter

    • getNeighbor

      public Cell getNeighbor(Cell cell, Direction dir)
      Given a Cell, returns a neighboring Cell in the given Direction.
      Parameters:
      cell - Cell whose neighbor in the given Direction is to be retrieved
      dir - Direction of the neighbor from the perspective of the Cell given
      Returns:
      the neighboring Cell if one exists, null if no such neighbor exists in this maze

    • connectNeighbors

      public void connectNeighbors(Cell origin, Cell neighbor)
      Given two neighboring Cells, sets the Cell that is located between the neighbors as a path, thus connecting the two neighboring Cells together.
      Parameters:
      origin - one of the two neighboring Cells
      neighbor - another one of the two neighboring Cells
      See Also:
      • getNeighbor(edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Cell, edu.westmont.cs030.maze.Direction)

    • toString

      public String toString()
      String representation of this maze to be used in rendering the maze.

      HINT Construct this string in the following manner:
      1. Add the "top" boundary of the maze first, using a row of Cell.WALL_TEXT with a newline.
      2. For each row that follows:
        • Add the "left" boundary of the maze, using just one Cell.WALL_TEXT.
        • Add each cell within the row, using Cell.getText() method.
        • Add the "right" boundary of the maze, using just one Cell.WALL_TEXT with a newline.
      3. Add the "bottom" boundary of the maze at the end, using a row of Cell.WALL_TEXT with a newline.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      string representation of this maze
      See Also:
      • StringBuilder

    • numRows

      public int numRows()
      Helper function that returns the number of rows in this maze.

      HINT Use the length attribute of the cells array.
      Returns:
      number of rows in this maze

    • numCols

      public int numCols()
      Helper function that returns the number of columns in this maze.

      HINT Use the length attribute of one of the rows of the cells array.
      Returns:
      number of columns in this maze
